title: Client not logging me in.
body: Been sitting here a good few minutes now. Are you going to actually help fix your client or are you going to sit here while your playerbase is dwindling as we speak.

replies.body:
Are you still experiencing issues logging into the client?  Some other players reported a similar issue and said that it was resolved.  

If you are still having this issue, what sort of login error do you get exactly?

Let me know!
